channel.title: Posts on Cory McCartan
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Cory McCartan

item.title: One State, Two States, Low State, High State
item.description: The standard U.S. map shows states laid out in two dimensions, but doesn't convey any information about the crucial third dimension: altitude.

item.title: 37 Supreme Court Justices on a Plane
item.description: The most common measure of Supreme Court justice ideology are the Martin–Quinn scores, developed by the eponymous political scientists. Since their original publication in 2002, the scores have been widely used, in political science and in the media, to place justices on a left–right political spectrum.

item.title: Swirling Fractals
item.description: Corresponding to each point in and around the Mandelbrot set is a Julia set. If we start with a point near the origin, and move it in a circle around the main bulb of the Mandelbrot set, the series of corresponding Julia sets morph beautifully into one another.
